      • add

        void add​(int row,
         int col,
         int digit)
        Puts digit in the box row, col.
        Parameters:
        row - The row
        col - The column
        digit - The digit to insert in box row, col
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row, col or digit is outside the range [0..9]

               int col,
               int nbr)
        Removes digit in the row, col.
        Parameters:
        row - The row
        col - The column
        nbr - The value
        Returns:
        true if it is possible to add, false if it's not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row, col or digit is outside the range [0..9]

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Checks that all filled in digits follows the the sudoku rules
        Returns:
        true if sudoku is solvable, false if it's not

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all the digit on the board.

      • setMatrix

        void setMatrix​(int[][] m)
        Fills the grid with the digits in m. The digit 0 represents an empty box.
        Parameters:
        m - the matrix with the digits to insert
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if m has the wrong dimension or contains values outside the range [0..9]
